name: finonest-monorepo
description: Finonest - Separated MERN Financial Services Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist node_modules
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm start
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && npm start
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run start && sleep 5 && curl http://localhost:3000 && curl http://localhost:5000/health
